ai-patthana8.34:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.34:1.1_0: One does not give rise to the thought, nor does what is cause and condition for the sake of object.
ai-patthana8.34:1.1_1: objects to the teaching, not by cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.34:1.1_2: objects to the teaching, or by a support, and there are no cause or condition for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana8.34:2.1_0: Experiencing consciousness does not give rise to the cause,
ai-patthana8.34:2.1_1: Experiencing consciousness does not give rise to the cause,
ai-patthana8.34:2.1_2: Experiencing consciousness, etc., does not arise with a reason for (another) bodily form.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_0: Not the Dhamma, nor does the object give rise to a cause, and there is no reason for the object.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the object, or for the sake of teaching, conditioned by conditions.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_2: or based on the object, nor does the object, nor do blowing, etc., arise with a reason for condition.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.34:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
